name: Awingeance
description:
A last stand against The Supreme Hakloss, destroy the enemy flagship at all costs.

Use arrow keys or WASD to move and space to shoot. Be careful, damage to your ragged ship may cause it to behave differently.

Made for the LOWREZJAM 2021

Music by Riku Tuominen

Sound Effects from SFXR from http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

With thanks to the Awful Jams crew
